__TOC__

** Make: Toshiba

** Brand: Portégé

** Model: R500-12R

=== Current Issues ===
** NetworkManager is unable of turning on the 3g modem. It can be turned on only with toshset -3g on
** Transflective Button is unable of turning on the transflective mode. It can be turned on only with toshset -trmode on
